attributes.action: impose a windfall tax on MPs second home expenses equal to Capital Gains Tax on second properties (40%).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs expenses relating to the furnishing and maintenance of second homes indicate that can avoid taxes on profit and gains.  We the taxpayer foot the bill for these expenses whilst the Exchequer is loosing out on revenue.  To begin to restore confidence and trust in MPs, they should be subject to an extraordinary windfall tax for their second home expenses over the last 5 years.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
